DOC.HEADLINE: NATION IN BRIEF ; MISSOURI ; 3 IN ABU NIDAL CELL JAILED IN TERROR PLOT
DOC.TEXT: Three members of the Abu Nidal organization , described by the State_Department as the world ' s most dangerous terrorist group , were sentenced in St . Louis to 21 months in prison for plotting terrorist acts.The case was the first indication that a cell was operating in the country . Tawfiq Musa , 45 , of Milwaukee , and brothers Saif Nijmeh , 35 , of the St . Louis suburb of Bridgeton , and Luie Nijmeh , 30 , of Dayton , Ohio , pleaded guilty in July to racketeering charges . The defendants and a fourth man were indicted on charges they plotted to kill Jews and blow_up the Israeli Embassy in Washington .
